mapper.select: SELECT p.id,p.pid,p.name,p.path FROM eb_system_permissions p right join eb_system_role_permissions rp on rp.pid = p.id right join eb_system_role r on rp.rid = r.id right join eb_system_admin a on FIND_IN_SET(r.id, a.roles) where p.is_delte = 0 and r.`status` = 1 and a.id = #{userId} GROUP BY p.id;
